long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create and run automated tests in your browser, in order to ensure your website works as intended. Find bugs before your customers do!

mateo Recorder is intended as an extension to our test automation tool mateo (free one-month trial available).

Export these automated tests to mateo for further test automation and additional features.

You may use this plugin to retrieve and store locators of your automated test, even without a running mateo backend.
